directions: In a large pot over medium heat pour in olive oil. Saute whole garlic cloves, onion, bacon and red pepper flakes; cook until onion is translucent.  Add tomato sauce, basil, oregano, salt and pepper; cook on low for 10 minutes.

Stir in bouillon cubes, cannellini beans and water; cook for 30 minutes.  Remove the 7 whole garlic cloves, discard 3 and crush the remaining 4; return to pot.  Add uncooked pasta and continue cooking until pasta is done.  Mixture should be slightly soupy.  Serve immediately.
ingredients: 6 slices bacon, cut into small pieces
1 (15 ounce) can cannellini beans, with liquid
title: Pasta Fagioli II
